heading: HR00280
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION BY THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO REVIEW THE PARTICIPATION OF FOREIGNERS IN THE OWNERSHIP AND OPERATIONS OF THE NATIONAL GRID CORPORATION
status: Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-03-07
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00280
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION BY THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO REVIEW THE PARTICIPATION OF FOREIGNERS IN THE OWNERSHIP AND OPERATIONS OF THE NATIONAL GRID CORPORATION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUAREZ, DANILO E.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-30
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-10-06
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-03-07
          -The Committee deferred further deliberation on the measure pending submissions of the opinion/ruling on NGCP’s tax exemptions of the Department of Finance.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY ON 2016-09-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-09-05;
